text: Francesco Gaeta (1879 - 15 April 1927) was an Italian poet. His early works were initially influenced by Gabriele D'Annunzio, and were characterized by a sentimental and sensual mood. His language featured both refined and popular elements. He committed suicide, aged 47. ==Selected works== * Il libro della giovinezza (1895) * Sonetti voluttuosi e altre poesie (1906) * Salvatore Di Giacomo (1911, essay) * Poesie d'amore (1920) Category:1879 births Category:1927 deaths Category:Poets who committed suicide Category:Italian poets Category:Italian male poets Category:Suicides in Italy Category:Male suicides
title: Francesco Gaeta (poet)
